description:
Optimizations and Micro-Optimizations in CPython

Presented by Mr. Larry Hastings

CPython mostly gets faster from one version to the next. And when
CPython gets faster, your programs get faster. This talk is a survey of
optimizations made to CPython, recent and historical, large and small.
Audience doesn't need to be familiar with CPython internals, but should
be familiar with Python and conversant in C.

[VIDEO HAS ISSUES: Audio interference]
title: Optimizations And Micro-Optimizations In CPython (#38)
